post_text:
Log In Issues?
Some of our chromebooks are experiencing a connectivity lag. Meaning, when a student attempts to log in they either keep getting kicked back to the log in screen or they get kicked into the wifi connection window. NHA is working on a solution for this widespread issue.

The solution we have found to work is as follows:

Turn off chromebook for about 20 seconds.
Turn back on.
Leave chromebook sit open - DO NOT LOG IN - for about 10 minutes.
Then log in.

We are hoping this helps alleviate any frustration our families may be having with these new technology assets.

As usual, any technology issues can be directed to Mrs. Murray at 20.amurray@nhaschools.com

Additionally, student households may pick up breakfast and lunch during one initial stop at the school. They are not required to come back for each meal service.
